definition: end credits (of a movie etc)/ending (of a movie etc)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc

sentences.english: Rolling captions are offen used in movie or TV head and end.
sentences.chinese: 滚动字幕是电影或电视中片头和片尾经常使用的手段。

sentences.english: Are you touched by the music when the movie ends?
sentences.chinese: 电影落幕时，你被它的片尾曲感动了吗？

sentences.english: They show how, at the end, we depend on the legends of our lives to give them meaning.
sentences.chinese: 片尾，他们都讲了如何赋与生活中的传奇以现实意义。

sentences.english: And sometimes they show it the end of the movie.
sentences.chinese: 有的影片在片尾把这些放出来。

sentences.english: I tried the top of the line of Irish whistle that originally made in Irish later on.
sentences.chinese: 戏中最后采用的也是这一版，并且作为片尾曲。

definition: opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
